law.catch_line: The General Assembly may make such changes in this Article, except in Section seventh thereof, as it...
law.text: The General Assembly may make such changes in this Article, except in Section seventh thereof, as it may deem best; and this Article shall not be so construed, or taken as to make the political Corporation of Baltimore independent, of, or free from the control, which the General Assembly of Maryland has over all such Corporations in this State.
